subject_terms_3: Bose, Subhas Chandra Indian National Army (Singapore) Indian National Army Monument Site Padang (Singapore) periodicals
physical_appearance: This clipping is a page from the periodical 'The Orient Illustrated Weekly' published on 14 April 1946. The title is printed at the top of the page. There are two black-and-white photographs of the Indian National Army. There is small light stain near the top-right of the page. The edges of the page are slightly folded.
context_1: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose addresses the Soldiers of the Indian National Army
title_text: The Orient Brave Sons of Hind! The Only Thing You Lacked Was Arms!
subject_terms_1: nationalism Indian (South Asian) armies rallies ceremonies political events periodicals
